extension.description: Interfaces with the windows program AmbiBox to switch profiles for ambient lighting. This requires that the free program Ambibox is installed. Download here: http://www.ambibox.ru/en/index.php/Main_Page Detailed instructions: http://wiki.xbmc.org/index.php?title=Add-on:AmbiBox Notice: this program will read from the windows registry to check that Ambibox has been installed! In addition, if configured to start Ambibox if not running, it will access the program and start it.

Interfaces with the windows program AmbiBox to switch profiles for ambient lighting. This requires that the free program Ambibox is installed. Download here: http://www.ambibox.ru/en/index.php/Main_Page Detailed instructions: http://wiki.xbmc.org/index.php?title=Add-on:AmbiBox Notice: this program will read from the windows registry to check that Ambibox has been installed! In addition, if configured to start Ambibox if not running, it will access the program and start it.

S'interface avec le programme Windows AmbiBox pour permuter les profils en fonction de l'éclairage ambiant. Ceci exige que le programme libre AmbiBox soit installé. Télécharger ici : http://www.ambibox.ru/en/index.php/Download_AmbiBox Instructions détaillées : http://wiki.xbmc.org/index.php?title=Add-on:AmbiBox Avis : ce programme lira le registre Windows pour vérifier si le programme AmbiBox est installé ! De plus, s'il est configuré pour démarrer AmbiBox s'il ne tourne pas, il accédera au programme et le démarrera.

Sąsaja su AmbiBox Windows programa, kuri perjungia aplinkos apšvietimo profilius. Reikia, kad būtų įdiegta nemokama AmbiBox programa . Ją galite atsisiųsti čia: http://www.ambibox.ru/en/index.php/Main_Page Išsami instrukcija: http://wiki.xbmc.org/index.php?title=Add-on:AmbiBox Pastaba: ši programa kreipsis į Windows registrus tam, kad patikrintų ar įdiegta AmbiBox! Papildomai, jei nustatyta paleisti AmbiBox, jei ji neveikia, šis priedas ją paleis.

Verbindt met het Windows-programma AmbiBox om profielen te schakelen voor sfeerverlichting. Dit vereist dat het gratis programma Ambibox is geïnstalleerd Download hier: http://www.ambibox.ru/en/index.php/Main_Page Gedetailleerde instructies: http://wiki.xbmc.org/index.php?title=Add-on:AmbiBox Opmerking: dit programma zal lezen uit het windows register om te controleren da AmbiBox is geïnstalleerd! toevoeging, wanneer zodanig is geconfigureerd om Ambibox te starten wanneer het niet is gestart, zal het het programma openenen en starten.

Interfaces com o programa para Windows, AmbiBox, com foco na mudança de perfis de iluminação ambiente. Isto requer que o programa gratuito Ambibox encontre-se instalado. Baixe aqui: http://www.ambibox.ru/en/index.php/Main_Page Instruções detalhadas: http://wiki.xbmc.org/index.php?title=Add-on:AmbiBox Aviso: este programa vai ler o registro do Windows para verificar se o Ambibox se encontra instalado! Além disso, se configurado para iniciar Ambibox e este não estiver sendo executado, ele irá acessar o programa e iniciá-lo.
